str2: LORD -- the proper name of the God of Israel

parse: Verb - Piel - Imperfect - third person masculine singular | second person masculine singular
str2: To kneel, to bless God, man, to curse

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Conjunctive imperfect - third person masculine singular | second person masculine singular
str2: To hedge about, guard, to protect, attend to
